attributes.action: Stop Ukraine Armed Forces Attacks on East Ukraine Civilians
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned petition the UK government to oppose the Ukraine government's use of the Ukraine Armed Forces and private armies in carrying out military attacks on the civilian population of East Ukraine. We oppose the use of indiscriminate airstrikes, mortar and artillery shelling on the civilian population, schools, hospitals and residential areas. We oppose the Ukraine Armed Forces use of banned substances such as chemical and biological weapons, including white Phosphorous. We request the UK government to provide immediate humanitarian aid to the affected population of East Ukraine and its refugees and to impose sanctions on the Ukraine government if it persists in killing civilians.  We also oppose the Ukraine government's ongoing marginalisation and oppression of the ethnic Russian population of East Ukraine.
